meta.description:
We've done the research for you! Donate to receive a comprehensive list of 
your state and federal laws that protect you from unlawful discrimination. 
Use this to educate others and stop discrimination in public places, 
schools and the workplace.

title: GET YOUR STATE LAWS — THE HEALTHY AMERICAN.org
cleaned_text:
“Your research has been EXTREMELY helpful. I'm in Texas. I'm so happy that we have someone like you on our side. God bless you for all you do!” ~ Greg Sharp

“I sooo appreciate your style, attitude, dedication, willingness to serve, dedication to "doing it God's way"---you are an inspiration! Thank you for everything! Love & blessings” --Lois P.

“Thank you for all of your time and resources. May the Lord continue to bless you.’ - Barbara Gill

opengraph.title: GET YOUR STATE LAWS  — THE HEALTHY AMERICAN.org
